definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-

pinyin: xu1 ni3 zhuan1 yong4 wang3 luo4
xu1 ni3 xian4 shi2 zhi4 biao1 yu3 yan2
xu1 ni3 si1 ren2 wang3 luo4

sentences.english: Furthermore, little effort has been devoted to the investigation of the function of fictive motion.
sentences.chinese: 另外，對虛擬運動作用的研究也沒有繼續深化。

sentences.english: This link represents the network access that the server provides to the virtual system.
sentences.chinese: 該鏈接代表了服務器提供給虛擬機系統的網絡訪問。

sentences.english: Virtual network tied pull you and me.
sentences.chinese: 虛擬的網絡牽繫着你和我。

sentences.english: Thus, embodiments of a virtual local memory for a graphics processor are disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，公開了圖形處理器的虛擬本地存儲器的實施例。

sentences.english: The effect of real-time water surface can consumedly enhance the immersion characteristic of virtual reality system.
sentences.chinese: 實時水面效果可以大大增強虛擬現實系統的沉浸感。

sentences.english: One booming area is in virtual worlds.
sentences.chinese: 虛擬世界是一個蓬勃發展的領域。

sentences.english: In addition the indirect method of determination of hyPothetic forces is also considered.
sentences.chinese: 文中也考慮了虛擬力的間接求解的簡化計算法。

sentences.english: Virtuality and social media are closely tied.
sentences.chinese: 虛擬世界和社會化媒體關係緊密。

sentences.english: I must wonder how far is too far when venturing into a virtual reality.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道當冒險進入虛擬現實時走多遠纔算可以？

sentences.english: Create and copy virtual machine images to multiple workstations.
sentences.chinese: 創建並複製虛擬機映像到多個工作站。

sentences.english: This person creates virtual portals and typically manages the shared resources.
sentences.chinese: 這個人創建了虛擬門戶並且往往管理這一共享資源。

sentences.english: An exposed service should be virtualized from the consumer's point of view.
sentences.chinese: 一個經過公開的服務應該從客戶的角度進行虛擬化。

sentences.english: It has simply lost its physical body, gone virtual.
sentences.chinese: 它僅僅只是失去了紙幣的皮囊，變成虛擬貨幣而已。

sentences.english: There are several parameters within the virtual memory settings that let us do this.
sentences.chinese: 可以使用虛擬內存設置中的幾個參數實現這個目的。

sentences.english: Virtual passports are stamped at each national pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 每個展館都會幫你在虛擬護照上蓋章。

definition: imitation/to simulate/to imitate/analog (device, as opposed to digital)
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
